AVIANS.description: After the battle starts, restores 5% of the character’s HP and increases defense by 10%. For every 10% of HP lost, additionally restores 0.5% HP and increases defense by 1%.

AVIANS.name: Lunar Sprite
AVIANS.description: After the battle starts, the Character's DEF increases by 60% and ATK increases by 10% every 15s for 5s, during which the Character restores 3% of lost HP for every 10 basic attack or combo hits taken. (Triggers at the start of the battle.)

AVIANS.name: Dharma
AVIANS.description: Every 20s after the battle starts, gains 3 stacks of Toughness (capped at 3), each of which increases DMG RES by 3.5%. For every 12% Max HP taken as DMG loses 1 stack of Toughness. (Triggers at the start of the battle.)

AVIANS.name: Kuwagiro
AVIANS.description: After the battle starts, for every 10,000 HP owned, gain 12 Attack.

AVIANS.name: Sharkler
AVIANS.description: Every 7 attacks (including Basic ATK, Combo, Counter, and Active Skill casts), deals an additional 60% AoE Basic DMG as Bleed damage (ignores DMG Immunity).

AVIANS.name: Ganiran
AVIANS.description: Every Critical Hit reduces the target's Crit Resistance by 12%, lasting until the end of the battle, stacking up to 10 times.

AVIANS.name: Guilmon
AVIANS.description: At the start of battle, deals 625% AoE Basic ATK DMG every 15s, increasing ATK by 10% for 5s. (Triggers once battle starts)

breeding.breedingNotes: Item required for breeding Digimon avians. Obtain only during the collab event.

AVIANS.name: Impmon
AVIANS.description: At the start of battle, deals 625% AoE Basic ATK DMG every 15s, increasing ATK SPD by 15% for 5s. (Triggers once battle starts)

breeding.breedingNotes: Item required for breeding Digimon avians. Obtain only during the collab event.

AVIANS.name: Gallantmon
AVIANS.description: At the start of battle, deals 765% Skill DMG, 305% Combo DMG, and 305% Counter DMG every 15s, increasing ATK by 15% for 5s. (Triggers once battle starts)

breeding.breedingNotes: Item required for breeding Digimon avians. Obtain only during the collab event.

AVIANS.name: Megidramon
AVIANS.description: Deals 500% Skill DMG, 200% Combo DMG, and 200% Counter DMG every 16s, inflicting target with 200% Skill DMG, 80% Combo DMG, and 80% Counter DMG per sec for 5s. (Triggers once battle starts)

breeding.breedingNotes: Item required for breeding Digimon avians. Obtain only during the collab event.

AVIANS.name: Beelzemon
AVIANS.description: Deals 765% Skill DMG, 305% Combo DMG, and 305% Counter DMG every 15s, increasing ATK SPD by 15% and Crit DMG by 15% for 5s. (Triggers once battle starts)

breeding.breedingNotes: Item required for breeding Digimon avians. Obtain only during the collab event.

AVIANS.name: D. Phantom Beast Demon Lord
AVIANS.description: Every 15 seconds after the battle starts, reduces enemy ATK by 5% and DMG RES by 5% for 5 seconds. If the enemy is under Stun, Knock-up, Disarm, Restrain, Freeze, or Bind status when the skill is triggered, these ATK and DMG RES debuffs are doubled. (Triggers once immediately at the start of battle).

AVIANS.name: Moonlight Rabbit
AVIANS.description: Every 15 seconds after the battle starts, increases Pal Combo Rate by 40% for 3 seconds. (Triggers once immediately at the start of battle).

AVIANS.name: Ra
AVIANS.description: Immediately at the start of battle, forcibly changes current HP to 50% of its value and grants a Shield equal to 60% of Max HP for 20 seconds. (This Shield is not affected by PvP reduction or shield-breaking effects). After the Shield expires, ATK increases by 10% for 10 seconds.

AVIANS.name: Midnight Bunny
AVIANS.description: Every 8 Basic attacks, deals an additional 75% Combo DMG and reduces the target's Energy Regen SPD by 15% for 2 seconds.

AVIANS.name: Owl
AVIANS.description: Grants 40% Skill DMG. After the battle starts, for every 1% of Skill DMG possessed, grants an additional 1% Basic Attack DMG. This effect lasts until the end of battle.

AVIANS.name: Shiny Owl
AVIANS.description: Grants 40% Skill DMG and 20% Skill Crit DMG. After the battle starts, for every 1% of Skill DMG possessed, grants an additional 1% Basic Attack DMG; for every 1% of Skill Crit DMG possessed, grants an additional 3% Crit DMG. This effect lasts until the end of battle.

Ram forward every 8s, dealing 1000% Skill DMG, 200% current Combo DMG (can be Crit), 200% current Counter DMG (can be Crit), and DMG equal to 4% Max HP to targets in the area.

After 6s of battle or when HP first falls below 60%, removes the Sealed state (losing the bonus DMG RES and DEF, and regaining the ability to act), deals 3000% Skill DMG, 1200% current Combo DMG, 1200% current Counter DMG, and DMG equal to 8% of Max HP to targets within range, and increases own DMG RES by 10%, ATK by 10%, and reduces Control Duration by 20%.

ATK +15% for 4s.

Additionally, ATK and DEF are increased by 20%, and DMG RES is increased by 15%.

1. CC duration randomly reduced by 12%~30%
2. DEF randomly increased by 8%~20%
3. ATK Speed randomly increased by 12%~30%
4. DMG Reduction randomly increased by 5%~12%
5. ATK randomly increased by 5%~12%

Basic attacks have a 10% chance to reduce the target's Basic ATK DMG RES by 2%, stacking up to 5 times.

Skills have a 50% chance to reduce the target's Skill DMG RES by 2%, stacking up to 5 times.
Inflict Deter on an enemy every time they have dealt 15 Basic Attacks in total or the first time their HP drops below 50%, with a 60% chance of inflicting Decay and a 60% chance of inflicting Weaken.

Weaken: Lowers the enemy's ATK by 4%, stacking up to 3 times.

Every 11s after the battle starts, deals 2000% AoE Skill DMG, 800% AoE Combo DMG, and 800% AoE Counter DMG, and Paralyzes the target for 5s.
Every Combo has a 20% chance to reduce own Combo Rate by 30% for 2s.
Every Counter has a 20% chance to reduce own Counter Rate by 30% for 2s.
Every Skill Crit reduces own Skill Crit Rate by 30% for 2s.
Every Pal Crit has a 50% chance to reduce that Pal's Crit Rate by 30% for 2s.
Effects do not stack; re-triggering resets the duration.
Upon casting a Skill or every 8 Basic attacks, Combos, or Counters (calculated separately by type), deals an additional 100% of current Basic ATK AoE DMG.
50% chance to apply a Bleed effect to the target, dealing 40% Basic ATK DMG per second for 5s.
This effect can be stacked and ignores DMG Immunity.
For every 10 (basic attack, combo, counter, skill) unleash, release a sword aura, dealing 150% of current basic attack DMG.
Every 5s, the next Basic ATK deals an extra 500% current Basic ATK AoE DMG (triggers at start).
When HP drops to a certain level, the cooldown is reset, the effect is strengthened, and additional effects occur:
First time HP is below 80%: Deals an additional 1250% of Basic ATK DMG, 1250% of Skill DMG, 500% of Combo DMG, and 500% of Counter DMG.
When HP falls below 60% for the first time, the strengthened effect of basic attacks will be activated every 4 seconds.
When HP falls below 40% for the first time, directly kills targets with HP below 5%.

otherForm.descriptionOtherForm: Unlocked after obtaining the Aurora Sword - Premium Decoration

text: When HP drops below 20% for the first time, restores 100% HP within 1s (Immune to death and Invincible during this period). Recovery is unaffected by other effects.
After recovery, grants a permanent 10% ATK increase until the end of the battle.
However, at the same time, you will lose 10% of your current HP every second for 10s (ignores DMG immunity).
After battle starts, each Basic ATK has a 20% chance to deal an additional 200% current Basic ATK AoE DMG, 500% AoE Skill DMG, 200% current Combo AoE DMG, and 200% current Counter AoE DMG.

Additionally, there is a 40% chance to deal an additional 200% current Basic ATK AoE DMG (can be Crit), 600% AoE Skill DMG, 200% current Combo AoE DMG (can be Crit), and 200% current Counter AoE DMG (can be Crit).
This effect will instantly execute targets with HP below 5%.

otherForm.descriptionOtherForm: Unlocked after obtaining the Aurora Sword - Premium Decoration

text: Gains 10% Final DMG RES after the battle starts.

Every 12s, deals 2000% Skill DMG, 400% current Basic ATK DMG (can be Crit), 400% current Combo DMG (can be Crit), 400% current Counter DMG (can be Crit), and DMG equal to 1.6% of the target's Max HP (ignores Immunity) to all enemies after a short charge, recovers HP equal to 50% of the total DMG dealt (ignores PvP deduction, capped at 20% Max HP), and increases the target's active skill cooldown duration by 1.6s (capped at initial cooldown duration).
Also, increases the next instance of Skill DMG of 'Fearless Stride' by 50%, stacking up to 4 times.
(Triggers at the start of the battle.)

text: Judges once every 10s after battle starts.
If the current HP is over 50 times the current ATK, Final DMG Boost increases by 12%; otherwise, Final DMG RES increases by 12%, lasting until the next judgment.

If the enemy's current HP is higher, deals DMG equal to 10% of their current HP (ignores DMG immunity) and recovers an equal amount of HP (ignores PvP reduction, capped at 30% Max HP); otherwise, reduces the enemy's ATK by 16%, lasting until the next judgement (cannot be cleansed).
(Triggers at the start of the battle.)
